CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Customer_Contact__r.MailingAddress)) , (Customer_Contact__r.MailingStreet &' '& Customer_Contact__r.MailingCity &' '& Customer_Contact__r.MailingState &' '& Customer_Contact__r.MailingCountry &' '& Customer_Contact__r.MailingPostalCode) ,(Lead__r.Street &' '& Lead__r.City &' '& Lead__r.State &' '& Lead__r.Country &' '& Lead__r.PostalCode) )
CustomField.label: Address
